* The Compiler class compiles composer into a phar
* Compiles composer into a single phar file
* @param string $pharFile The full path to the file to create
'Can\'t run git log. You must ensure to run compile from composer git repository clone and that git binary is available.'
'Can\'t run git log. You must ensure to run compile from composer git repository clone and that git binary is available.'
// get branch-alias defined in composer.json for dev-main (if any)

'Extra file listed is missing from the filesystem: '
'These files were expected but not added to the phar, they might be excluded or gone from the source package:'
'These files were unexpectedly added to the phar, make sure they are excluded or listed in $extraFiles:'
// disabled for interoperability with systems without gzip ext

* Removes whitespace from a PHP source string while preserving line numbers.
* @return string The PHP string with the whitespace removed
* This file is part of Composer.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view
* the license that is located at the bottom of this file.
// Avoid APC causing random fatal errors per https://github.com/composer/composer/issues/264
fwrite(STDERR, 'Warning: APC <= 3.0.12 may cause fatal errors when running composer commands.'.PHP_EOL);
fwrite(STDERR, 'Update APC, or set apc.enable_cli or apc.cache_by_default to 0 in your php.ini.'.PHP_EOL);
echo 'PHP\'s phar extension is missing. Composer requires it to run. Enable the extension or recompile php without --disable-phar then try again.' . PHP_EOL;
// add warning once the phar is older than 60 days
